page.title: 11continued...
page.content: clusters which pulsate and milk the cows. The milk passes along tubes into glass jars where it is measured before passing into a large{bulk tank}in the dairy where it is cooled by fins moving while cold water is circulated round the inner layer of the tank. This process of milking six cows is repeated until all cows are milked. All the dairy equipment must be thoroughly{washed and sterilized}after each milking.Milking and cleaning takes about{2\ hours. A large milk tanker from{Fane {Valley Dairy}collects the milk each day.It is measured and tested before being taken to the Dairy to be {pasteurised and bottled}.From here milk men deliver bottles to customers' doorsteps each morning.
